findings.title: State Variable Default Visibility
findings.description: State variable visibility is not set

findings.title: Weak Sources of Randomness from Chain Attributes
findings.description: The contract uses weak sources of randomness from chain attributes, which can make it predictable and vulnerable to attacks.

findings.title: Unprotected SELFDESTRUCT Instruction
findings.description: The SELFDESTRUCT instruction is used without protection, which can lead to unintended contract destruction.

findings.title: Unprotected Ether Withdrawal
findings.description: The smart contract allows unprotected ether withdrawal.

findings.title: Unchecked Call Return Value
findings.description: The return value of a call is not checked.

findings.title: Function Default Visibility
findings.description: State variable visibility is not explicitly set.
